mapper.select: SELECT d.dob_code, u.user_code, u.user_id, d.dob_nickname, u.user_name, u.phone, u.regist_datetime, o.order_datetime, dobby_service_count FROM tbl_user u JOIN tbl_dobby d on (d.user_code = u.user_code) LEFT JOIN (select user_code, MAX(order_datetime) as order_datetime from tbl_order group by user_code) o ON (u.user_code=o.user_code) LEFT JOIN (select dob_code, count(*) as dobby_service_count from tbl_service group by dob_code) s ON (d.dob_code=s.dob_code) WHERE auth = 'DOBBY';

SELECT d.dob_code, d.dob_nickname, d.dob_img, d.dob_content, d.dob_area, d.dob_career_days, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.phone, u.email, u.regist_datetime, s.service_code, s.service_title, s.service_explain, s.service_price, s.service_status, s.service_created, s.thumbnail_url, o.order_datetime FROM tbl_user u JOIN tbl_dobby d on (d.dob_code = u.user_code) LEFT JOIN tbl_service s on (d.dob_code = s.dob_code) LEFT JOIN tbl_order o on (s.service_code = o.service_code) WHERE d.dob_code = #{ dobCode };

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_service a
JOIN tbl_dobby b ON(a.dob_code = b.dob_code)
a.service_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND a.service_created > #{ start }
AND #{ end } > DATE_ADD(a.service_created, INTERVAL -1 DAY)
AND dob_code = #{ dobCode } AND service_status != 'U' AND service_status != 'R'
ORDER BY service_created DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_calculate WHERE dob_code = #{ dobCode }

SELECT a.service_code, a.service_title, b.reserve_datetime as payDatetime, b.total_price, a.thumbnail_url, IFNULL(d.cal_status, 0) as cal_status FROM tbl_service a LEFT JOIN tbl_order b ON a.service_code = b.service_code JOIN tbl_payment c on c.order_code = b.order_code LEFT JOIN (select cal_code as cal_status, pay_code from tbl_calc_fin) d on (c.pay_code = d.pay_code) JOIN tbl_dobby e on a.dob_code = e.dob_code WHERE a.dob_code = #{ dobCode } ORDER BY d.cal_status DESC LIMIT #{selectCriteria.offset}, #{selectCriteria.limit}
